      • hotelToAccomomodateRes

        public boolean hotelToAccomomodateRes(java.lang.String[] input)
        This method will check whether the booking requested can be made under this particular hotel. It will go through all the rooms make sure that it can accommodate all the rooms requested if it true then it will process the reservation.
        Parameters:
        input - WIll be an array containing a full stream of input from the particular file. With the command Book
        Returns:
        status Either true or false to indicate whether its sucessfull or not.

      • processReservation

        public void processReservation(java.lang.String username,
                      java.util.Calendar startDate,
                      int numNight,
                      java.lang.String roomType)
        This method is to add the reservation itself to the LinkedHashMap of LinkedHashMap in the Room class down the road. This is to iterate through it.
        Parameters:
        username - The user for the booking
        startDate - The start of date of the booking
        numNight - The number of night for that particular reservation
        roomType - The type of room that the user want.
